common.error_demand_command: You need to specify at least one command.

commit.command_description: Starts an interactive wizard to create a conventional commit message.
commit.error_no_changes_staged: No changes added to stage. Please use 'git add' before committing.

prompt.select_type: Select the type of change that you're committing:
prompt.scope: What is the scope of this change (e.g. component or file name)? (optional)
prompt.short_description: Write a short, imperative tense description of the change:
prompt.long_description: Provide a longer description of the change (optional). Use '|' for newlines:
prompt.affected_issues: Does this change affect any open issues? (e.g. 'closes #123') (optional)

types.style: style:    Changes that do not affect the meaning of the code
types.refactor: refactor: A code change that neither fixes a bug nor adds a feature
types.perf: perf:     A code change that improves performance
types.test: test:     Adding missing tests or correcting existing tests
types.chore: chore:    Changes to the build process or auxiliary tools

config.command_description: Manage StackCode global and local configuration.

prompt.main: What do you want to configure?
prompt.toggle_validation: Enable mandatory conventional commit validation for this project?

success.set_validation: ✔ Success! Commit validation for this project is now {status}.

error.not_in_project: ✖ This command must be run from the root of a project initialized with StackCode.

generate.command_description: Generates project files. Run interactively or specify a type (e.g., readme).
generate.option_filetype_description: The type of file to generate.

prompt.readme_overwrite: A README.md file already exists. Overwrite?
prompt.interactive_select: Which files would you like to generate?

git.command_description: Provides a suite of commands to assist with the Git workflow.
git.prompt_interactive_action: What Git action would you like to perform?
git.action_finish: Finish a branch and open a PR (finish)
git.subcommand_start_feature_description: Creates a new branch from the latest 'develop' branch.
git.option_name_description: The name of the new branch (e.g., 'add-login-feature').

finish_feature.description: Pushes the current branch and opens the New Pull Request page in the browser.

git.error_specify_subcommand: Please specify a git subcommand (e.g., start, finish).
git.error_not_git_repo: ✖ This command must be run inside a Git repository.
git.error_parsing_remote: ✖ Could not parse GitHub repository path from remote URL.
git.info_creating_branch: 🚀 Creating and switching to new branch: {branchName}
git.prompt_branch_type: Select the type of branch you want to create:
git.prompt_branch_name: Enter the name for the new branch:
git.info_opening_browser: -> Opening your browser to create a Pull Request...
git.success_pr_ready: ✅ Success! Your browser should open shortly.

init.command_description: Starts an interactive wizard to set up a new project.
init.welcome: Welcome to StackCode! Let's set up your new project.

prompt.project_name: What is the name of your project?
prompt.description: Provide a short description of the project:
prompt.stack: Which stack would you like to use?
prompt.features: Which additional features do you want to include?

step.deps: -> Installing dependencies (this may take a moment)...

release.command_description: Helps with versioning and releasing the project.
release.error_structure: ✖ Could not determine project structure. Are you in the root of a monorepo with a `packages` directory?
release.prompt_confirm_release: Current version is {currentVersion}. Recommended next version is {newVersion}. Confirm release?
release.step_updating_versions: -> Updating version in all package.json files...
release.success_ready_to_commit: ✅ Success! Version updated and CHANGELOG.md generated.
release.next_steps_commit: Next steps: Review the changes, then run 'git commit' and 'git tag'.
release.independent_mode_no_changes: ✅ No changed packages detected. Everything is up to date!
release.independent_mode_no_bumps: ℹ️ Changes detected, but none require a new version (e.g., only chores or refactors).
release.independent_prompt_confirm: Confirm the release of the packages listed above?
release.next_steps_push: Next steps: Run 'git push --follow-tags' to publish.
release.independent_mode_packages_to_update: The following packages will be updated:
release.prompt_create_github_release: Do you want to create a GitHub release for this version?
release.info_github_token_needed: To create a GitHub release, StackCode needs a Personal Access Token (PAT).
release.info_github_token_instructions:
1. Create a token here: https://github.com/settings/tokens/new
  2. Give it the 'repo' scope.
  3. Copy the token (it starts with ghp_...) and paste it below.
release.prompt_save_token: Do you want to save this token securely for future use?

validate.command_description: Validates if a string is a conventional commit message.
validate.option_message_description: The commit message string to validate.
validate.success: ✔ Valid: This is a valid conventional commit message.
validate.error_invalid: ✖ Invalid: This is not a valid conventional commit message.
